Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.heater

Thermostated heater component for the Household Energy Management project.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HeaterExternalControlCI
    The component interface HeaterExternalControlCI declares the signatures of services used by the household energy manager to adjust the power consumption of the heater.
    HeaterExternalControlI
    The interface HeaterExternalControlI declares the signatures of service implementations accessible to the external controller.
    HeaterExternalControlJava4CI
    The class HeaterExternalControlJava4CI extends the component interface HeaterExternalControlCI with signatures that can be used in Java 4.
    HeaterInternalControlCI
    The component interface HeaterInternalControlCI declares the signatures of services used by the thermostat to control the heating by the heater.
    HeaterInternalControlI
    The interface HeaterInternalControlI defines the signatures of the services offered by the heater to its thermostat controller.
    HeaterTemperatureI
    The interface HeaterTemperatureI declares the signatures of the services accessing the current and target temperatures on the heater.
    HeaterUserCI
    The component interface HeaterUserCI declares the signature of the services offered and that can be required by the user from the heater.
    HeaterUserI
    The interface HeaterUserI declares the signature of the heater component services corresponding to the actions a user can perform on the heater.
    HeaterUserJava4CI
    The class HeaterUserJava4CI extends the component interface HeaterUserCI with signatures that can be used in Java 4.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CVMUnitTest
    The class CVMUnitTest performs unit tests for the thermostated heater component.
    Heater
    The class Heater implements a heater component.
    HeaterUnitTester
    The class HeaterUnitTester implements a component performing unit tests for the class Heater as a BCM component.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Heater.HeaterState
    The enumeration HeaterState describes the operation states of the heater.

Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.heater Description

Thermostated heater component for the Household Energy Management project.

This package defines a thermostated heater component used in the Household Energy Management project.
